results.firPara: • Senegalese moves to Anfield on five-year contract
results.secPara: Sadio Mané has signed for Liverpool on a five-year contract in a deal worth around £30m.
results.webTitle: Sadio Mané signs for Liverpool from Southampton in deal worth £30m

results.firPara: For Roy Hodgson and England there were no excuses this time. Throughout the group stage they complained opponents were sitting extremely deep, determined not to concede space in behind, blunting the strengths of Englands quick attackers. Iceland were widely expected to pose a similar challenge, having defended in huge numbers in previous matches.
results.secPara: But, by the standards of Euro 2016, where smaller sides parking the bus has been almost universal, Iceland started with a high defensive line. These were the type of opponents England wanted and yet they still contrived to fail.
results.webTitle: Iceland’s high defensive line bemuses Roy Hodgson’s nervous troops | Michael Cox

results.firPara: • He goes after four years in charge with poor record at major tournaments
results.secPara: Roy Hodgson stepped down as England manager on Monday night after Iceland inflicted one of the most humiliating defeats in the national teams 144-year history to eliminate them from the European Championship.
results.webTitle: Roy Hodgson quits as England manager after humiliating defeat by Iceland

results.firPara: The departed managers team were beaten by a more vibrant shadow version of themselves after another shuffling of non-specific parts into non-specific roles
results.secPara: The departed managers team were beaten by a more vibrant shadow version of themselves after another shuffling of non-specific parts into non-specific roles
results.webTitle: Roy Hodgson’s sickly imitation of old values leads to England’s uber-loss | Barney Ronay

results.firPara: At full time in Lyon, as the Republic of Ireland players made their way to the green corner of the stadium amid the tears and cheers after the 2-1 defeat to France on Sunday, it was hard not to ignore the symbolism of Shay Given and Robbie Keane, arms around each other, bidding farewell.
results.secPara: This may have been the tournament where a new generation of Republic of Ireland players came of age but Euro 2016 has also ushered out some of the nations greatest names.
results.webTitle: Robbie Keane and Shay Given symbolise Ireland’s changing of the guard

results.firPara: • Gudmundur Benediktsson shows emotion after historic victory in Nice
results.secPara: He may have being sacked from his day job on Sunday but Gudmundur Benediktsson probably does not care much now.
results.webTitle: ‘You can go out of Europe’: Iceland commentator savours win over England
